original_text: then you shall do to him as he had meant to do to his brother. So you shall purge the evil from your midst.
korean_text: 그가 그의 형제에게 행하려고 꾀한 그대로 그에게 행하여 너희 중에서 악을 제하라

sentences.original_text: then you shall do to him
as he had meant to do to his brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 형제에게 하려고 했던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: So you shall purge the evil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 너희는 그 악을 제거해야 한다
